Led. av stadsfulim. 30, i drätselkamm. sed. 28, i ’sko’lstyr. sed. 22, lönend sed. 32, i kyrkofuMm. s. å., i kyrkoråd, kyr-kovärd sed. 36, v. ordf. i fattigv :styr., ordf. i kyrkog:nd sed. 29, kassör i allm. vaim:fÖrb. iokalavd., huvudman i 0’skarsh. translated:
Engberg, John Konrad Leonard, manager, Oskarshamn, born on February 18, 1882 in Döderhults parish, Kalmar county, son of Valentin E. and Matilda Nilsson. He married Seima Peterson in 1904. They had three children: Gunnar, born in 1905 and now a chief engineer in Stockholm; John-Bertil, born in 1910 and now a clerk at A-B Swes Litogr. Tryckerier in Stockholm; and Maj, born in 1913 and married to clerk Bo Tullberg in Stockholm. 

He received a diploma from a secondary school and was employed by Oskarshamns Tryck. A-B in 1896. He became an accountant in 1904, manager in 1925, and a member of the board of directors and executive director of Nya A-B Oskarsh.-Tidn. from 1934. 

He was a member of the city council from 1930, the finance committee from 1928, the school board from 1922, the salary committee from 1932, the cemetery committee from the same year, the church council, and the church ward from 1936. He was the vice-chairman of the welfare board, chairman of the cemetery commission since 1929, treasurer of the local general public association, head of the 0'skarsh. Spar b. since 1933, and revised in 1939. PatrGM.
